whatIsEuMarkoMods.title: What is Eu, Marko!?
whatIsEuMarkoMods.content: Eu, Marko! is our platform dedicated to our Minecraft mods, where you can discover, download and share all our mods already made. Our mission is to facilitate your access to our mods and create a vibrant community of players.

howToRegister.title: How do I register?
howToRegister.content: To register, click the "Register" button in the top right corner of the page. Fill out the form with your username, email and password. After confirming your email, you will have full access to the platform.

howToDownload.title: How to download mods?
howToDownload.content: Browse our mod library, find what you like and click the "Download" button. You need to be logged in to download mods. After downloading, follow the specific installation instructions for each mod.

howToInstall.title: How to install mods?
howToInstall.content: Installation varies depending on the mod and mod loader (Forge, Fabric, etc.). Generally, you need to: 1) Install the appropriate mod loader, 2) Download the mod, 3) Place the .jar file in your Minecraft "mods" folder.

modIssues.title: What to do if a mod doesn't work?
modIssues.content: First, check if you have the correct version of the mod loader and Minecraft. Confirm that all dependencies are installed. If the problem persists, check the mod's comments section or contact us.

stillNeedHelp.title: Still have questions?
stillNeedHelp.description: Our support team is here to help. Contact us through the channels above or check out our complete documentation.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to the most common questions about Eu, Marko!

whatIsMarkoMods.title: What is Eu, Marko!?
whatIsMarkoMods.content: Eu, Marko! is our platform dedicated to our Minecraft mods, where you can discover, download and share all our mods already made. Our mission is to facilitate your access to our mods and create a vibrant community of players.

howToStart.title: How to start using Eu, Marko!?
howToStart.content:
To get started:

1) Create a free account
2) Explore our mod library
3) Download mods that interest you
4) Install following our instructions

It's simple and free!

isFree.title: Is Eu, Marko! free?
isFree.content: Yes! Eu, Marko! is completely free. You can create an account, download mods, favorite and use all features at no cost.

howToRegister.title: How do I register?
howToRegister.content: Click "Register" in the top right corner, fill out the form with your name, email and password. After confirming your email, you will have full access to the platform.

resetPassword.title: How to reset my password?
resetPassword.content: On the login page, click "Forgot my password". Enter your email and you will receive a link to reset your password. Follow the instructions in the email.

updateProfile.title: How to update my profile?
updateProfile.content: Access your dashboard by clicking on your avatar. In the "Profile" section, you can update your personal information, photo and preferences.

howToDownload.title: How to download mods?
howToDownload.content: Browse the library, find mods that interest you and click "Download". You need to be logged in. After downloading, follow the installation instructions.

howToInstall.title: How to install mods?
howToInstall.content:
Installation varies by mod and mod loader (Forge, Fabric, etc.).

Generally:

1) Install the appropriate mod loader
2) Download the mod
3) Place the .jar file in the Minecraft "mods" folder

favoriteMods.title: How to favorite mods?
favoriteMods.content: Click the heart icon on the mod card or on the details page. Favorite mods appear in your "Favorites" section on the dashboard.

findMods.title: How to find specific mods?
findMods.content: Use our search bar to search by name, category or keywords. You can also filter by Minecraft version, mod loader or popularity.

modCompatibility.title: How to check compatibility?
modCompatibility.content: Each mod has detailed compatibility information, including Minecraft version, required mod loader and dependencies. Always check before installing.

systemRequirements.title: What are the system requirements?
systemRequirements.content: To use Eu, Marko!: Minecraft Java Edition, Java 8 or higher, internet connection and modern browser. For specific mods, check individual requirements.

modIssues.title: What to do if a mod doesn't work?
modIssues.content: First, check if you have the correct version of the mod loader and Minecraft. Confirm that all dependencies are installed. If the problem persists, check the mod's comments section or contact us.

modLoader.title: Which mod loader to use?
modLoader.content: The choice depends on the mod. Forge is the most popular and compatible with most mods. Fabric is more modern and performant. Quilt is an alternative to Fabric. Check which one is recommended for the desired mod.

communityGuidelines.title: What are the community guidelines?
communityGuidelines.content: Our community values respect, collaboration and creativity. Be respectful to other users, share appropriate content, give credit to creators and help other members.

reportMod.title: How to report a problematic mod?
reportMod.content: Use the "Report" button on the mod page. Our moderation team will review the case and take appropriate action.

stillNeedHelp.title: Didn't find your answer?
stillNeedHelp.description: Our support team is here to help. Contact us through the channels below.

changelog.title: Changelog
changelog.subtitle: Technical record of changes on the site and in the mods.

whyDonate.title: Why donate?

1.title: Help Keep the Site Running
1.desc: Your donations help keep the site and continue creating awesome mods!

2.title: Support Development
2.desc: Support the development of new mods.

3.title: Free Mods
3.desc: All my mods are free. If you want to help keep this alive, any donation makes a difference. ‚ù§Ô∏è

4.title: Sneak Peek of Future Mods
4.desc: Receive spoilers of mods in development and participate in polls to decide the next mod!

5.title: Community
5.desc: Get access to an exclusive channel for donors on our Discord.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.a1: You can donate any amount through LivePix. Just access https://livepix.gg/eumarko or scan the QR Code on the page.
faq.a2: Yes! LivePix is a secure and reliable platform. All transactions are processed safely and securely.
faq.a3: Yes! There is no minimum or maximum. Any contribution is very welcome and appreciated!
faq.q4: Will I receive something in return?
faq.a4: Each donor receives our eternal gratitude! Soon, new systems will bring features and special benefits. üíú

thankYou.title: Thank You Very Much!
thankYou.desc: Every contribution, no matter the amount, helps us continue creating incredible content for you. Your donation makes all the difference! ‚ù§Ô∏è

donate.footer: Your donations help keep the site 100% free for everyone

terms.title: Terms of Use
terms.subtitle: The rules for using our Marko mods platform

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.subtitle: Hello! These terms explain how you can use our mods platform.
introduction.content: These terms explain how you can use the "Me, Marko!" platform to download and use our amazing mods. By using our site, you agree to follow these rules. If you don't agree with something, just don't use the site.

section1.title: Acceptance of Terms
section1.content: By accessing and using the "Me, Marko!" platform, you agree to follow these Terms of Use. If you don't agree with these terms, don't use the site.
details: Using the site means you automatically accept the terms
These terms apply to all users
You must accept to use the platform

section2.title: Use of the Site
section2.content: You agree to use the site only for legal purposes and in accordance with these terms. You must not use the site in a way that could harm or damage its operation.
details: Use only for legal purposes
Cannot damage or overload the system
Respect other users of the platform
Do not interfere with the site's operation

section3.title: User Content
section3.content: If you submit comments or other content, you give us permission to use, reproduce and distribute that content.
details: Worldwide and non-exclusive permission
We may modify and adapt the content
You remain the owner of your content
Content cannot violate other people's rights

section4.title: Intellectual Property
section4.content: The site and all mods available here belong to Marko! They are original creations made with great care.
details: The site belongs to Me, Marko!
All mods are original creations by Marko
Each mod is made thinking about players' fun
We respect Minecraft and Mojang's rights

section5.title: Disclaimer of Warranties
section5.content: Our mods are made with great care, but we cannot guarantee they will work perfectly in all cases.
details: We test all mods before making them available
But each computer is different
You use the mods at your own risk
If there's a problem, let us know and we'll try to help!

section6.title: Limitation of Liability
section6.content: If something goes wrong with your mods or computer, we cannot be responsible for the damages.
details: We are not responsible for damage to your computer
We are not responsible for data loss
We are not responsible for problems with other mods
You assume all risks when using our mods

section7.title: Changes to Terms
section7.content: We may change these terms when necessary. If you continue using the site, it means you accept the changes.
details: We may update the terms when needed
We will notify about important changes
Continuing to use = accepting the changes
Changes can happen at any time

contact.title: Contact
contact.subtitle: Have any questions about these terms? Contact us!

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.subtitle: Understand how we collect, use, and protect your personal information

section1.title: Information We Collect
section1.subtitle: We collect information you provide directly and information we collect automatically when you use our services.

items.label: Account data
items.description: Username, email address, password, and profile information

items.label: Comments
items.description: Comments and ratings you leave on mods

items.label: Communications
items.description: Emails you send us for contact

items.label: Technical information
items.description: IP address, browser type, operating system

items.label: Cookies
items.description: We use cookies to improve your experience and analyze site usage

section2.title: How We Use Your Information
section2.subtitle: We use your information to provide and improve our services
items: Provide access to mods and site functionalities
Process downloads and manage your user account
Allow comments and ratings on mods

section3.title: Information Sharing
section3.subtitle: We do not sell your personal information. We only share it in the situations described below.

items.title: Public comments
items.description: Your comments on mods are visible to other users

items.title: Legal obligations
items.description: When required by law or to protect rights

items.title: Consent
items.description: When you give us explicit permission

section4.title: Data Security
section4.subtitle: We implement technical and organizational security measures to protect your information

section5.title: Cookies and Similar Technologies
section5.subtitle: We use cookies to improve your experience and analyze site usage

items.desc: To understand how you use our site

section5.manageCookies: You can manage your cookie preferences through your browser settings.

section6.title: Your Rights
section6.subtitle: You have rights over your personal information according to GDPR/LGPD

items.desc: See what data we have about you
Correct incorrect information in your profile
Request removal of your account and data
Download your data in a readable format
Object to the use of your data
Contact us to exercise your rights

section7.title: Contact
section7.subtitle: If you have questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us
